result.execSummary:
The defendant Jose A Cruz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50 fine plus costs, including Court-appointed attorney fees upon Court's approval of attorney fee bill. 60 days to pay.
Good time and Huber privileges granted. 60 days to report.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose A Cruz

defendant.name: Cruz, Jose A
defendant.address: 137 S Hudson Avenue, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jose A Cruz in court with attorney Stephen Pleck Johnson. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews charge, max. penalties, elements. Defendant enters no contest plea. Court questions Defendant on rights, finds plea made freely and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds Defendant guilty. State/Defense make joint sentencing recommendations. Bond no longer in effect.

Defendant Jose A Cruz in court with attorney Stephen Pleck Johnson. Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense thinks the case is resolved, Defendant wants to discuss case with family, requests continuance.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Jose A Cruz in court with attorney Stephen Pleck Johnson. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense accepts Court appointment, enters not guilty pleas. Repayment of attorney fees discussed. Bond remains as is.  Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Court appoints Stephen Johnson, orders Defendant to pay $75 per month starting 9/1/15.
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: No violent contact direct or indirect with TC.  Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol.

Defendant Jose A Cruz in court. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Copy of Complaint given to Defendant in Court. Court reviews charge, max. penalties, right to counsel. Court questions Defendant, who wants Court-appointed attorney. Court reviews process of applying.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 10:30 am.
